alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cheyenne, eastern Kimball, western Morrill and eastern Banner Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 557 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Harrisburg, or 17 miles northeast of Kimball, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Kimball, Bridgeport, Potter, Dalton, Dix, Gurley, Brownson, Northport, Chimney Rock State Park, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Colton, Lorenzo, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, Court House And Jail Rocks, Sidney Airport, Redington, South Bayard Junction and Harrisburg. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 20 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
